title: The Devil of Gilding
description: Despite being sickly and vulnerable Toby Blake was raised to be trusting and kindhearted, so much so, that he wasn't able to see it coming. He didn't see that the woman he should have been able to trust would take it into her own hands to change his future.However, no one perceived the other set of eyes that were watching, the hands that were waiting... waiting to catch him when she let him fall.
author: D.E. Colombo
